agent/**/*.py: bash -c 'cd agent && files=(); for f; do files+=("${f#agent/}"); done; uv run ruff format "${files[@]}"' _
bash -c 'cd agent && files=(); for f; do files+=("${f#agent/}"); done; uv run ruff check "${files[@]}"' _

scripts.agent:analyze: cd agent && dotenvx run -f ../.env.stellaris-stats.secrets -- uv run budget-analyzer
scripts.agent:evals: cd agent && dotenvx run -f ../.devcontainer/.env.db.test -f ../.env.stellaris-stats -f ../.env.stellaris-stats.secrets -- uv run budget-evals
scripts.agent:sandbox-analyze: cd agent && dotenvx run -f ../.env.stellaris-stats.secrets -- uv run sandbox-budget-analyzer
scripts.agent:generate-fixture: cd agent && dotenvx run -f ../.env.stellaris-stats -- uv run python scripts/generate_sql_fixture.py
scripts.agent:list-saves: cd agent && dotenvx run -f ../.env.stellaris-stats.secrets -- uv run list-saves
scripts.build: npm run graphql:codegen && tsc -p tsconfig.src.json && tsc -p tsconfig.tests.json
scripts.format:python: cd agent && uv run ruff format
scripts.graphql-server:run: dotenvx run -f .env.stellaris-stats --strict -- npx tsx watch --include 'src/graphql/**/*' src/graphql/graphqlServerMain.ts
scripts.graphql:codegen: npm run graphql:codegen:typescript && npm run graphql:codegen:python
scripts.lint:python: cd agent && uv run ruff check
scripts.parser:run: dotenvx run -f .env.stellaris-stats --strict -- npx tsx watch src/parser/parserMain.ts
